title: RPG-Based Instructional Design Workshop for K-12 AI Education Designers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of artificial intelligence concepts and experience in educational design
context.additional_context: Strengthening the capacity of medical, legal, and technical experts to design AI curricula suitable for K-12 educational settings.

learning_goals: The machine learning process can be explained in three stages (lower/higher elementary, middle/high school) tailored to K-12 learners' levels
The data collection → rule inference → model optimization process can be designed as experiential activities using RPG mechanics
Educational strategies to enhance AI technology acceptance can be proposed, categorized into three elements: decision-making understanding, self-efficacy enhancement, and real-life application

resources: AI Education Kit (Including Graph Visualization Tools)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
